𒇺 liš ⇔ 𒇲 LA 𒋙 ŠU2 lal 𒇳

𒇺 ladle ⼔ ⲗⲓϫⲓ liči "dish"

𒇺𒊺 liš-še lasse let :

𒇺𒊺𒈬𒌑 𒍣𒅅𒊒𒌑𒀀
liš-še-mu-ú zi-ik-ru-ú-a
let my utterances be heard

𒇺𒆠𒁍 lis-ki-pu ≈ 𒅖𒆠𒁍 iš-ki-pu iš-kippe umkippen "overthrow"

𒇺 🥄 𓆁 spoon 🥣

𒇺 GeLade > Kelle ?

𒇺 dilim₂ delimiter "balance pan" 𒇺;𒌓𒊕𒁇𒇺

𒇺 dilim₂ 𒄑𒇺𒃲 dish, shallow bowl 𒇺 dilim₂ 𒄑𒇺𒃲 dish talířᵐ
